code: import React from'react';import{createMuiTheme,withStyles,makeStyles,ThemeProvider}from'@material-ui/core/styles';import Button from'@material-ui/core/Button';import{green,purple}from'@material-ui/core/colors';import firebase from'firebase';import axios from'axios';var BootstrapButton=withStyles({root:{boxShadow:'none',textTransform:'none',fontSize:16,padding:'6px 12px',border:'1px solid',lineHeight:1.5,backgroundColor:'#007bff',borderColor:'#007bff',fontFamily:['-apple-system','BlinkMacSystemFont','"Segoe UI"','Roboto','"Helvetica Neue"','Arial','sans-serif','"Apple Color Emoji"','"Segoe UI Emoji"','"Segoe UI Symbol"'].join(','),'&:hover':{backgroundColor:'#0069d9',borderColor:'#0062cc',boxShadow:'none'},'&:active':{boxShadow:'none',backgroundColor:'#0062cc',borderColor:'#005cbf'},'&:focus':{boxShadow:'0 0 0 0.2rem rgba(0,123,255,.5)'}}})(Button);var ColorButton=withStyles(function(theme){return{root:{color:theme.palette.getContrastText(purple[500]),backgroundColor:purple[500],'&:hover':{backgroundColor:purple[700]}}};})(Button);var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{margin:{margin:theme.spacing(1)}};});var theme=createMuiTheme({palette:{primary:green}});export default function AddItemButton(props){var classes=useStyles();return React.createElement(ThemeProvider,{theme:theme},React.createElement(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",className:classes.margin,onClick:function onClick(){axios.get("https://us-central1-forku-dc443.cloudfunctions.net/request/add?username=".concat(firebase.auth().currentUser.email,"&name=").concat(props.name,"&category=").concat(props.category,"&quantity=").concat(props.quantity,"&data=").concat(props.date)).then(function(status){if(status){props.updateRequests();}else{alert('The requested items are not available');}return null;});}},"Add Request"));}
